OCC: I'm sorry, but Yanshosh said that was legal before, so I don't know the
difference between right and wrong anymore, I won't do something like thjat
again...

ICRPGC: Radistor was pummeled by the blasts and the rockets but they didn't
faze him. Radistor looked to see who shot at him and turned back as
Oblitertron fired at him and threw his sword. Radistor leapt the shot with
Airbomber's jumping power but fell down as the sword came to him. Radistor
lifted his hands as the sword went crashing into him, slicing into his chest
and sticking there. Radistor reached up and pulled the sword from his chest,
dropping it, he walked toward Oblitertron.

"You are a powerful adversary, I commend you and recomend you, for the
Maximals, why do you fight us? We are all with each other now, and I'm
trusting that the Alliance wil boot you out if they found you doing this, so
I offer you another chance, I am not one to forsake my olympian ways."
Radistor said, obviously, the confused Stranato, leader of the Radicons, was
in control...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 4:14 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG


(Liono, you are just ticking me of man.  You mode really bad (no offense
intended), but this takes the cake.  No chance in "The Void" am I going to
accep that mode.  How the heck did Tigerhawk salvage the "Nemesis" fusion
cannon?  How is he lifting it?  How is he aiming?  How is he still standing
form the kickback?   How is he supplying it ith power?  That is a mode, and
if you continue with it, you're going to get kicked out of the RPG.  Alo,
Code, don't post damage.  Grabbing and twisting my hands, is a posting
damage.  You can say attempts, but you can't say you did.   Don't do that
please.  Wait until I actually reply.  Thank you)


Oblitertron/Nemesis Enforcer/Hades/Anubis/Beachcomber/Unitron:



Oblitertron chuckled deeply as Radastro formed, shot shitting him, though
the
machine gun and gattling gun's bullets didn't really do much against his
heavily armored form, remembering how easy it had been to crush him.  Seeing
him to begin to charge towards him, Oblitertron pulled his sword out of
subspace in a blink of an eye, throwing the sword at the approaching
Ridister's chest, firing an optic blast at Ridistor's left knee as the sword
left his hand.

---

"Hmmm...I'd prefer waiting until the Maximals had their backs turned, but
when Zardus gives orders, I take them...mosto f the time." Nemesis chuckled,
raising his rapid fire laser rifle, firing off twenty rapid blasts of laser
energy at the back of Radistor's head.  "ALLIANCE, KILL 'EM, KILL 'EM ALL!"

---

Anubis chuckled.  "By the Void, d�j� vu." he said, slowly edging away,
raising his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at Radistor's side.

---

Hades chuckled as well.  "I thought we killed those fools.  Must be using
magic or something." he "joked" raising his missile launcher and firing a
rocket off at the back of Radistor's left knee.

---

Unitron was watching the display of stupidity from the Maximals.
Intercepted
coms told him the attacking gestalt, who he'd though they had killed,
despite
direct orders, was now going to get them all further beaten.  As they had
before, killing of treaties.  HE HAD TO HELP!  Putting his rifles in
subspace, he took out his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the
middle
of Radister's back.

---
